chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Your Response:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

Your Response:
```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
Representable: forall n : nat, naryFunc n -> Formula -> Prop
RepresentableAlternate: forall (n : nat) (f : naryFunc n) (A B : Formula), SysPrf NN (iffH A B) -> expressible.RepresentableHelp NN n f A -> expressible.RepresentableHelp NN n f B
RepresentableHelp: forall n : nat, naryFunc n -> Formula -> Prop
Representable_ext: forall (n : nat) (f g : naryFunc n) (A : Formula), extEqual n f g -> expressible.RepresentableHelp NN n f A -> expressible.RepresentableHelp NN n g A
succFormula: Formula
zeroFormula: Formula
projFormula: nat -> Formula

Goal:
forall (n m : nat) (pr : m < n), Representable n (evalProjFunc n m pr) (projFormula m)

Premises:
iffH = fol.iffH LNN : fol.Formula LNN -> fol.Formula LNN -> fol.Formula LNN
extEqual : forall n : nat, naryFunc n -> naryFunc n -> Prop
SysPrf = folProof.SysPrf LNN : fol.System LNN -> fol.Formula LNN -> Prop
Formula = fol.Formula LNN : Set
naryFunc = fix naryFunc (n : nat) : Set := match n with | 0 => nat | S n0 => nat -> naryFunc n0 end : nat -> Set Arguments naryFunc _%nat_scope
NN = Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNN) (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNN) (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNN) (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNN) (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNN) (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNN) (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNN) (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNN) (Ensembles.Singleton (fol.Formula LNN) NN1) NN2) NN3) NN4) NN5) NN6) NN7) NN8) NN9 : Ensembles.Ensemble (fol.Formula LNN)
Trying to mask the absolute name "RepresentableHelp"! [masking-absolute-name,deprecated]
Tauto.A : ?TA -> ?AA -> Tauto.GFormula where ?TA : [Representable := expressible.Representable NN : forall n : nat, naryFunc n -> Formula -> Prop RepresentableAlternate := expressible.RepresentableAlternate NN closedNN1 : forall (n : nat) (f : naryFunc n) (A B : Formula), SysPrf NN (iffH A B) -> expressible.RepresentableHelp NN n f A -> expressible.RepresentableHelp NN n f B RepresentableHelp := expressible.RepresentableHelp NN : forall n : nat, naryFunc n -> Formula -> Prop Representable_ext := expressible.Representable_ext NN : forall (n : nat) (f g : naryFunc n) (A : Formula),
evalProjFunc : forall n m : nat, m < n -> naryFunc n
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
inl : ?A -> ?A + ?B where ?A : [Representable := expressible.Representable NN : forall n : nat, naryFunc n -> Formula -> Prop RepresentableAlternate := expressible.RepresentableAlternate NN closedNN1 : forall (n : nat) (f : naryFunc n) (A B : Formula), SysPrf NN (iffH A B) -> expressible.RepresentableHelp NN n f A -> expressible.RepresentableHelp NN n f B RepresentableHelp := expressible.RepresentableHelp NN : forall n : nat, naryFunc n -> Formula -> Prop Representable_ext := expressible.Representable_ext NN : forall (n : nat) (f g : naryFunc n) (A : Formula), extEqual n f g -> expressible.RepresentableHelp NN n f A ->...-> Formula |- Type]
inr : ?B -> ?A + ?B where ?A : [Representable := expressible.Representable NN : forall n : nat, naryFunc n -> Formula -> Prop RepresentableAlternate := expressible.RepresentableAlternate NN closedNN1 : forall (n : nat) (f : naryFunc n) (A B : Formula), SysPrf NN (iffH A B) -> expressible.RepresentableHelp NN n f A -> expressible.RepresentableHelp NN n f B RepresentableHelp := expressible.RepresentableHelp NN : forall n : nat, naryFunc n -> Formula -> Prop Representable_ext := expressible.Representable_ext NN : forall (n : nat) (f g : naryFunc n) (A : Formula), extEqual n f g -> expressible.RepresentableHelp NN n f A ->...-> Formula |- Type]
fst : ?A * ?B -> ?A where ?A : [Representable := expressible.Representable NN : forall n : nat, naryFunc n -> Formula -> Prop RepresentableAlternate := expressible.RepresentableAlternate NN closedNN1 : forall (n : nat) (f : naryFunc n) (A B : Formula), SysPrf NN (iffH A B) -> expressible.RepresentableHelp NN n f A -> expressible.RepresentableHelp NN n f B RepresentableHelp := expressible.RepresentableHelp NN : forall n : nat, naryFunc n -> Formula -> Prop Representable_ext := expressible.Representable_ext NN : forall (n : nat) (f g : naryFunc n) (A : Formula), extEqual n f g -> expressible.RepresentableHelp NN n f A ->...-> Formula |- Type]
right : ?B -> {?A} + {?B} where ?A : [Representable := expressible.Representable NN : forall n : nat, naryFunc n -> Formula -> Prop RepresentableAlternate := expressible.RepresentableAlternate NN closedNN1 : forall (n : nat) (f : naryFunc n) (A B : Formula), SysPrf NN (iffH A B) -> expressible.RepresentableHelp NN n f A -> expressible.RepresentableHelp NN n f B RepresentableHelp := expressible.RepresentableHelp NN : forall n : nat, naryFunc n -> Formula -> Prop Representable_ext := expressible.Representable_ext NN : forall (n : nat) (f g : naryFunc n) (A : Formula), extEqual n f g -> expressible.RepresentableHelp NN n f A ->...-> Formula |- Prop]
left : ?A -> {?A} + {?B} where ?A : [Representable := expressible.Representable NN : forall n : nat, naryFunc n -> Formula -> Prop RepresentableAlternate := expressible.RepresentableAlternate NN closedNN1 : forall (n : nat) (f : naryFunc n) (A B : Formula), SysPrf NN (iffH A B) -> expressible.RepresentableHelp NN n f A -> expressible.RepresentableHelp NN n f B RepresentableHelp := expressible.RepresentableHelp NN : forall n : nat, naryFunc n -> Formula -> Prop Representable_ext := expressible.Representable_ext NN : forall (n : nat) (f g : naryFunc n) (A : Formula), extEqual n f g -> expressible.RepresentableHelp NN n f A ->...-> Formula |- Prop]
snd : ?A * ?B -> ?B where ?A : [Representable := expressible.Representable NN : forall n : nat, naryFunc n -> Formula -> Prop RepresentableAlternate := expressible.RepresentableAlternate NN closedNN1 : forall (n : nat) (f : naryFunc n) (A B : Formula), SysPrf NN (iffH A B) -> expressible.RepresentableHelp NN n f A -> expressible.RepresentableHelp NN n f B RepresentableHelp := expressible.RepresentableHelp NN : forall n : nat, naryFunc n -> Formula -> Prop Representable_ext := expressible.Representable_ext NN : forall (n : nat) (f g : naryFunc n) (A : Formula), extEqual n f g -> expressible.RepresentableHelp NN n f A ->...-> Formula |- Type]
pair : ?A -> ?B -> ?A * ?B where ?A : [Representable := expressible.Representable NN : forall n : nat, naryFunc n -> Formula -> Prop RepresentableAlternate := expressible.RepresentableAlternate NN closedNN1 : forall (n : nat) (f : naryFunc n) (A B : Formula), SysPrf NN (iffH A B) -> expressible.RepresentableHelp NN n f A -> expressible.RepresentableHelp NN n f B RepresentableHelp := expressible.RepresentableHelp NN : forall n : nat, naryFunc n -> Formula -> Prop Representable_ext := expressible.Representable_ext NN : forall (n : nat) (f g : naryFunc n) (A : Formula), extEqual n f g -> expressible.RepresentableHelp NN n f A ->...-> Formula |- Type]
VectorDef.rect2 : forall P : forall n : nat, VectorDef.t ?A n -> VectorDef.t ?B n -> Type, P 0 (VectorDef.nil ?A) (VectorDef.nil ?B) -> (forall (n : nat) (v1 : VectorDef.t ?A n) (v2 : VectorDef.t ?B n), P n v1 v2 -> forall (a : ?A) (b : ?B), P (S n) (VectorDef.cons ?A a n v1) (VectorDef.cons ?B b n v2)) -> forall (n : nat) (v1 : VectorDef.t ?A n) (v2 : VectorDef.t ?B n), P n v1 v2 where ?A : [Representable := expressible.Representable NN : forall n : nat, naryFunc n -> Formula ->...-> Formula |- Type]
nil : list ?A where ?A : [Representable := expressible.Representable NN : forall n : nat, naryFunc n -> Formula -> Prop RepresentableAlternate := expressible.RepresentableAlternate NN closedNN1 : forall (n : nat) (f : naryFunc n) (A B : Formula), SysPrf NN (iffH A B) -> expressible.RepresentableHelp NN n f A -> expressible.RepresentableHelp NN n f B RepresentableHelp := expressible.RepresentableHelp NN : forall n : nat, naryFunc n -> Formula -> Prop Representable_ext := expressible.Representable_ext NN : forall (n : nat) (f g : naryFunc n) (A : Formula), extEqual n f g -> expressible.RepresentableHelp NN n f A ->...-> Formula |- Type]
cons : ?A -> list ?A -> list ?A where ?A : [Representable := expressible.Representable NN : forall n : nat, naryFunc n -> Formula -> Prop RepresentableAlternate := expressible.RepresentableAlternate NN closedNN1 : forall (n : nat) (f : naryFunc n) (A B : Formula), SysPrf NN (iffH A B) -> expressible.RepresentableHelp NN n f A -> expressible.RepresentableHelp NN n f B RepresentableHelp := expressible.RepresentableHelp NN : forall n : nat, naryFunc n -> Formula -> Prop Representable_ext := expressible.Representable_ext NN : forall (n : nat) (f g : naryFunc n) (A : Formula), extEqual n f g -> expressible.RepresentableHelp NN n f A ->...-> Formula |- Type]
expressible.Representable_ext : forall (T : System) (n : nat) (f g : naryFunc n) (A : Formula), extEqual n f g -> expressible.RepresentableHelp T n f A -> expressible.RepresentableHelp T n g A
expressible.RepresentableAlternate : forall T : System, ClosedSystem LNN T -> forall (n : nat) (f : naryFunc n) (A B : Formula), SysPrf T (iffH A B) -> expressible.RepresentableHelp T n f A -> expressible.RepresentableHelp T n f B
RepresentableHalfHelp : forall (T : System) (n : nat) (f : naryFunc n) (A : Formula), RepresentableHalf1 T n f A -> RepresentableHalf2 T n f A -> expressible.RepresentableHelp T n f A
reduceAddExists : forall (n m : nat) (A B : Formula), SysPrf NN (iffH A B) -> SysPrf NN (iffH (addExists m n A) (addExists m n B))
reduceAddForalls : forall (n m : nat) (A B : Formula), SysPrf NN (iffH A B) -> SysPrf NN (iffH (addForalls m n A) (addForalls m n B))
reduceAddExistsOneWay : forall (n m : nat) (A B : Formula), SysPrf NN (impH A B) -> SysPrf NN (impH (addExists m n A) (addExists m n B))
expressibleAlternate : forall T : System, ClosedSystem LNN T -> forall (n : nat) (R : naryRel n) (A B : Formula), SysPrf T (iffH A B) -> ExpressibleHelp T n R A -> ExpressibleHelp T n R B
VectorDef.t_rect : forall (A : Type) (P : forall n : nat, VectorDef.t A n -> Type), P 0 (VectorDef.nil A) -> (forall (h : A) (n : nat) (t : VectorDef.t A n), P n t -> P (S n) (VectorDef.cons A h n t)) -> forall (n : nat) (t : VectorDef.t A n), P n t
evalStrongRecHelp2 : forall (a : nat) (f : naryFunc (S (S a))) (n m : nat), m < n -> extEqual a (evalComposeFunc a 1 (Vector.cons ((fix naryFunc (n0 : nat) : Set := match n0 with | 0 => nat | S n1 => nat -> naryFunc n1 end) a) (evalStrongRecHelp a f n) 0 (Vector.nil ((fix naryFunc (n0 : nat) : Set := match n0 with | 0 => nat | S n1 => nat -> naryFunc n1 end) a))) (fun b : nat => codeNth (n - S m) b)) (evalStrongRec a f m)
Representable2Expressible : forall T : System, ClosedSystem LNN T -> SysPrf T (notH (equal (natToTerm 1) (natToTerm 0))) -> forall (n : nat) (R : naryRel n) (A : Formula), expressible.Representable T n (charFunction n R) A -> Expressible T n R (substituteFormula LNN A 0 (natToTerm 1))
evalStrongRecHelp1 : forall (f : naryFunc 2) (n m : nat), m < n -> codeNth (n - S m) (evalStrongRecHelp 0 f n) = evalStrongRec 0 f m
extEqualCompose2 : forall (n : nat) (f1 f2 : naryFunc n), extEqual n f1 f2 -> forall g1 g2 : naryFunc (S n), extEqual (S n) g1 g2 -> extEqual n (compose2 n f1 g1) (compose2 n f2 g2)
boundedLT : forall (m : nat) (a : Formula) (x : nat), (forall n : nat, n < m -> SysPrf NN (substituteFormula LNN a x (natToTerm n))) -> SysPrf NN (impH (LT (var x) (natToTerm m)) a)
extEqualCompose : forall (n m : nat) (l1 l2 : Vector.t (naryFunc n) m) (f1 f2 : naryFunc m), extEqualVector n m l1 l2 -> extEqual m f1 f2 -> extEqual n (evalComposeFunc n m l1 f1) (evalComposeFunc n m l2 f2)
projectionListId : forall (n : nat) (f : naryFunc n) (p : n <= n), extEqual n f (evalComposeFunc n n (projectionList n n p) f)
expressible.RepresentableHelp : System -> forall n : nat, naryFunc n -> Formula -> Prop
extEqualPrimRec : forall (n : nat) (g1 g2 : naryFunc n) (h1 h2 : naryFunc (S (S n))), extEqual n g1 g2 -> extEqual (S (S n)) h1 h2 -> extEqual (S n) (evalPrimRecFunc n g1 h1) (evalPrimRecFunc n g2 h2)
extEqualTrans : forall (n : nat) (a b c : naryFunc n), extEqual n a b -> extEqual n b c -> extEqual n a c
iffTrans : forall (T : System) (f g h : Formula), SysPrf T (iffH f g) -> SysPrf T (iffH g h) -> SysPrf T (iffH f h)
iffI : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula), SysPrf T (impH f g) -> SysPrf T (impH g f) -> SysPrf T (iffH f g)

```coq
intro n m.
intro pr.
generalize dependent m.
induction pr; intros; auto.

(* n = S m *)
unfold Representable in *.
rewrite RepresentableAlternate with (A := projFormula m) (B := projFormula m).
rewrite IHpr.
apply RepresentableHelp.

(* n > S m *)
unfold Representable in *.
rewrite RepresentableAlternate with (A := projFormula m) (B := projFormula m).
rewrite IHpr.
apply RepresentableHelp.
Qed.
